alert.note: Alert for Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 1:23PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Washington County through 200 PM CDT... At 122 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Drake Field Airport. This storm was drifting northward. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Farmington... Elkins... West Fork... Greenland... Drake Field Airport... Johnson... Walnut Grove... Tuttle... Sulphur City... Hicks... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 53 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
